title: Animal Sounds
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 20 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Meow! Oink! Moo! Students will read about many animal sounds, including a surprising animal at the end -- a human!
meta: bark, bees, birds, buzz, cats, chirp, cows, dads, dogs, ducks, hiss, lions, meow, moo, oink, pigs, quack, roar, snakes, snore
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Capitalization : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
Onomatopoeia : Understand that some words sound like their meaning (onomatopoeic words)

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
